v1.list: SELECT * FROM data_set WHERE Data_Set_Group = V1

v2.list: SELECT * FROM data_set WHERE Data_Set_Group = V2

v3.list: SELECT * FROM data_set WHERE Data_Set_Group = V3

v4.list: SELECT * FROM data_set WHERE Data_Set_Group = V4

v5.list: SELECT * FROM data_set WHERE Data_Set_Group = V5

v6.list: SELECT * FROM data_set WHERE Data_Set_Group = V6

v7.list: SELECT * FROM data_set WHERE Data_Set_Group = V7

v8.list: SELECT * FROM data_set WHERE Data_Set_Group = V8

v9.list: SELECT * FROM data_set WHERE Data_Set_Group = V9
v9.sub_sector_emissions: SELECT Sector, Sub_Sector, SUM(Granular_Data) AS Data FROM v9_sector_co2_emissions GROUP BY Sub_Sector
v9.sector_emissions: SELECT Sector, SUM(Granular_Data) AS Data FROM v9_sector_co2_emissions GROUP BY Sector

V10.list: SELECT * FROM data_set WHERE Data_Set_Group = V10
V10.human_history_2m: SELECT *, 0 AS Static_Value FROM v10_human_condition_milestones_reduced WHERE Years_Before_Present <= 2000000
V10.human_history_1k: SELECT *, 0 AS Static_Value FROM v10_human_condition_milestones_reduced WHERE Date >= "1006-01-01"

posts.create_post: INSERT INTO post (Description, Date_Time, User_ID, Public, Two_Columns) VALUES (:description, NOW(), :user_id, :public, :two_columns)
posts.add_chart: INSERT INTO post_chart (Post_ID, Chart_ID, Custom_Description) VALUES (:post_id, (SELECT Chart_ID FROM chart WHERE Name = :chart_name), :description)
posts.remove_chart: DELETE FROM post_chart WHERE Post_ID = 1 AND Chart_ID = (SELECT Chart_ID FROM chart WHERE Name = :chart_name
posts.set_visibility: UPDATE post SET Public = :public WHERE Post_ID = :post_id
posts.set_columns: UPDATE post SET Two_Columns = :two_columns WHERE Post_ID = :post_id
posts.get_charts: SELECT c.Name FROM post_chart p JOIN chart c ON p.Chart_ID = c.Chart_ID WHERE Post_ID = :post_id
posts.delete_post: DELETE FROM post WHERE Post_ID = post_id
